L GFR (estimated) 47.00 L Na 150 H K 3.1 L Cl 116 H CO2 27 BUN 44 H Cr 1.5 H WBC 13.5 H RBC 3.16 L Hgb 9.6 L Hct 28.5 L MCV 90.3 RDW 24.1 C Platelets 68 L Neutrophils 92 H Lymphs 5 L Monocytes 3 L Eosinophils 0 Basophils 0 Type of Differential Automated Differential Automated differential reviewed and verified PT 24.6 H INR 2.1 H PTT 36.2 H **DATE[Oct 31] 01:02 Glucose (bedside) 230 H GT Prophylaxis:Lansoprazole Labs: Reviewed - - - - - ASSESSMENT AND PLAN Assessment: ESLD secondary to PSC not a transplant candidate s/p ICU stay secondary to bacteremia and peritonitis - - - - - Problem/Diagnosis1: 293.0: Delirium, d/t conditions classified elsewhere; multifactorial: prolonged hospitalization, hepatic failure, recovering sepsis; Assessment/Plans: appers to be improving. Can also have risperidone 0.25 q6 PRN available for agitation Problem/Diagnosis2: Goals of care; Assessment/Plans: family meeting **DATE[Nov 1 2009] with girlfriend and other family to determine best site of care. Dr. **NAME[UUU] requesting Palliative care SW to be in attendance. Need to eluciadate what is improtant to the family about the way that the patient lives. If QOl is most iporttant and getting h8m home vs. quantity of life, I agree that further lifelimiting infections should not be treated and he should not be transferred to the ICU. In addition, if current QOL is not acceptable, could argue to stop his midodrine and octreotide as well. If QOl is what is important, would not add additional agents/therapies that will get him further away from goal(if it be home). Of note, pt's addressis listed as Windber. There is an inpt hospice unit there. - - - - - RECOMMENDATIONS Other: Discussed with dr. **NAME[UUU] and his team. Family meeting at 4PM. He requests Pall care SW to be present. - - - - - ATTENDING NOTE AND ATTESTATION ATTENDING NOTE AND ATTESTATION: Time: of this time, the number of minutes that were spent on counseling and/or coordination of care was: 20 - - - - - ATTENDING PHYSICIAN SIGNATURE: Electronically signed by **NAME[YYY ZZZ], MD (Epic# 18735) at 10:20; **NAME[ZZZ, YYY] ?; 2177/8511; **DATE[Nov 1 2009]; 10:20 - - - - - VISIT CODE(S): 99232 - - - - -
